data.author: Heiko Hirschmueller
data.message:
Added auto start/stop parameter -a to rcdynamics_stream

By default, rc_dynamics is not started and stopped, only if -a is given.
This allows to listen for a certain period to dynamics streams that are
already enabled and should not be stopped.

data.author: Felix Endres
data.message:
REST API calls now return the state machine state

Mirrored the States of the rc_dynamics statemachine,
since the header is not available on the host machine

An exception is thrown if the entered state is unknown
to this module.

data.author: Felix Endres
data.message:
Provide start_slam + stop_slam for rc_dynamics

Adapt to newest rc_dynamics version.
Changed interface:
  start(bool with_restart) -> start() and restart()

This way it is consistent with the REST-API.

With a straightforward extension, some combinations of with_restart and
starting SLAM would not be directly translatable to (and thus not be
consistent with) the REST API inteface, e.g. with
- start(bool with_restart, bool with_slam)
start(true, true) needs REST-API "restart" if SLAM is running, but
"restart" and "start_slam" otherwise.

data.author: emmerich
data.message:
improved robustness of RemoteInterface (SENS-571)

- interface is connecting to rc_visard when constructed and getting all available streams
- availability of streams is checked client-side in interface

data.message: removed unused includes from example

data.author: emmerich
data.message:
re-factored and improved rc_dynamics_api (SENS-571)

- new, separate object DataReceiver that can be used independently of RemoteInterface to receive data
- new functions to add and delete destinations to RemoteInterface
- RemoteInterface is now a 'parameterized singleton'
- prepared DataReceiver object and RemoteInterface for multi-type streaming (template about ProtobufType)

data.author: emmerich
data.message:
slight improvements on remote interface

- removed other_addrs as it is unused
- added error output in case cleanUp process can not be done

data.author: emmerich
data.message:
improved connection logic of rc_dynamics remote interface (SENS-571)

- rc_visard subnet mask is not longer required for figuring out
local IP address for stream destination
- local IP address can be influenced by user giving desired interface
- changed tool vins_stream accordingly
